languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, у меня приказ. Я, разумеется, не могу запретить вам поступать как вздумается. Но я обязан следовать за вами".
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, у меня приказ. Я, разумеется, не могу запретить вам поступать как вздумается. Но я обязан следовать за вами".

traits.locale_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."
"I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

languages.text: "Ich habe meine Befehle, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich kann Euch natürlich nicht verbieten, zu tun, was Ihr wollt. Aber es ist meine Pflicht, Euch zu folgen."
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe meine Befehle, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Ich kann Euch natürlich nicht verbieten, zu tun, was Ihr wollt. Aber es ist meine Pflicht, Euch zu folgen."

languages.text: « J'ai reçu des ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne peux évidemment pas vous interdire d'agir à votre guise, mais j'ai le devoir de vous suivre. »
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai reçu des ordres, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne peux évidemment pas vous interdire d'agir à votre guise, mais j'ai le devoir de vous suivre. »

languages.text: “我有命令在身，大人。虽然您想做什么我无权制止，但我有责任跟在您身边。”
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: “我有命令在身，大人。虽然您想做什么我无权制止，但我有责任跟在您身边。”

languages.text: 「私には命令があります、陛下。もちろん、あなたが思い通りに行動することを禁ずるわけにはいきません。しかし、私の職務はあなたに従うことです」
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: 「私には命令があります、{mf|陛下|陛下}。もちろん、あなたが思い通りに行動することを禁ずるわけにはいきません。しかし、私の職務はあなたに従うことです」

languages.text: «Tengo órdenes, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Obviamente no puedo prohibirle que haga lo que quiera. Pero es mi deber seguirle».
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: «Tengo órdenes, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Obviamente no puedo prohibirle que haga lo que quiera. Pero es mi deber seguirle».

languages.text: "Kati emir aldım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Pek tabii dilediğinizi yapmanızı engelleyemem ama vazifem gereği sizi takip etmem şart."
languages.original_text: "I have my orders, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. I obviously can't forbid you to do as you please. But it's my duty to follow you."

traits.locale_text: "Kati emir aldım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Pek tabii dilediğinizi yapmanızı engelleyemem ama vazifem gereği sizi takip etmem şart."
